title: Graph of $$sin\left(2pix\right)$$
body: Answer parts a and $$b$$. From the graph of $$sin\left(2\pi x\right)$$ shown: a. Explain why $$\int_{0}^{1} sin\left(2\pi t\right) \,dt=0$$ and $$b$$. Explain why, in general, $$\int_{a}^{a+1} sin\left(2\pi t\right) \,dt=0$$ for any value..\n##figure1.gif
